directions: In large kettle, cook onion in margarine until soft. Blend in flour and seasonings; gradually stir in broth, milk and beer. Cook over medium heat, stirring constantly, until mixture comes to a boil; boil and stir until thickened. Add cheese, stirring and heating until smooth.
To Serve: Ladle into soup cups or bowls. Garnish with popcorn, croutons, minced parsley, chives, minced green onion or crumbled crisp bacon.
ingredients: 3 cups finely shredded sharp Cheddar cheese, (12 ounces)
title: Beer Cheese Soup - Byerly'S
